text: Libra proposes massive public investment
in industry housing and social services
a more realistic exchange rate for the
pound and a national agreement with the
onions to cover pay prices profits and
much else on Europe the document
promises withdrawal in an amicable and
orderly way the law would be changed
there'd be negotiations with our
partners but after a period of
transition Britain would be out within
the lifetime of a parliament labour
would cancel trident and cruise remove
other US nuclear bases and include
Britain's Polaris in the Geneva
negotiations but all this would have to
be compatible with staying in NATO other
proposals include ending the Lord's
legislative Parrs a new cabinet minister
to supervise women's rights and a
Freedom of Information bill could the
country afford at all
Britain cannot afford to continue with
the present policies we cannot afford to
continue with policies of mass
unemployment
that means pouring down the drain 15 16
17 billion pounds a year it means
pouring down the drain our precious
North Sea oil and wasting it we can't
afford bass unemployment and this this
our policy is the one that explains why
and how we can travel in the opposite
direction
